results.deck: Founded by seven former Ubisoft employees in 2000, Cyanide Studio has developed and produced games in numerous genres, including sports management, real time strategy, fantasy, and action RPG.
results.description:
Overview

Cyanide Studio began in 2000 with its Cycling Manager game. Since then, they have developed several manager titles; in addition to the cycling, they have added management simulations in horse racing and rugby. Other games include Loki: Heroes of Mythology and iSurf for the iPhone platform. In June 2009, Cyanide Studios acquired the rights to make a game based George R. R. Martin's popular fantasy book series A Song of Ice and Fire. Both an RTS and an RPG are in the works, and Cyanide plans to release the game on "next generation" consoles and PC.
results.name: Cyanide Studio

game.name: Pro Cycling Manager Season 2012: Le Tour de France

concept.name: Games That Ask You to "Press Start" But Will Accept Other Buttons
